articles.title: Famed Ukrainian ballet star Artem Datsyshyn dies of injuries from Russian attack - New York Post
articles.description: Ukrainian ballet star Artem Datsyshyn died Saturday, three weeks after he came under Russian gunfire in Kyiv, according to reports.
articles.content:
Ukrainian ballet star Artem Datsyshyn died Saturday, three weeks after he came under Russian gunfire in Kyiv, according to reports.
